term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - reference atom, in organic reaction mechanisms
term.title: reference atom

item.text: The atom to which a primitive change is nucleophilic, electrophilic, nucleofugal or homolytic.

sources.item: PAC, 1989, 61, 23. 'System for symbolic representation of reaction mechanisms (Recommendations 1988)' on page 55 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198961010023)
